what: Properly importing text from PDF files that may contain columns or other text boxes
title: Properly importing text from PDF files that may contain columns or other text boxes
text: pdftools package available importing PDF files. However, package work optimally importing PDF files multiple columns text boxes. Since thepdftools::pdf_text() function pdftools package processes text line line, often fails maintain context text. result, output may contain sentences unrelated fragments text different parts page. Words placed correct context unsuitable text analysis. However, words grouped clusters package using Density-Based Spatial Clustering algorithm likely contextually related thus suitable text analysis. See vignette("pdftextclusteR") information usage package.
